value.title: Artificial Intelligence Wants You and Your Job
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence (AI) behind the soothing voice telling us where to turn has replaced passenger-seat navigators, maps, even traffic updates on the radio. How on earth did we survive before this technology arrived in our lives?

value.title: Facebook open-sources Droidlet robotics development platform
value.excerpt: Facebook researchers wrote in a blog today that Droidlet ... but we believe that by sharing our research work with the AI community, all of us will get there faster.” You can read more about Droidlet here or check out the platform’s GitHub page.

value.title: SA first to award patent recognising artificial intelligence as inventor
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence has invented a food container with a practical adaption for the transfer of heat into and out of the container.

value.title: Edtech Startup SP Robotic Works Raises $3 Mn From Mount Judi Growth Fund, Others
value.excerpt: SP Robotic Works has raised $3 Mn in Series A funding. With this round, the edtech startup has raised a total of $4 Mn in investment.

value.title: What the U.S. Can Learn From Europe’s Approach to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Americans have good reason to be skeptical of artificial intelligence. Tesla crashes have dented the dream of self-driving cars. Mysterious algorithms predict job applicants’ performance based on little more than video interviews.

value.title: Are There Robot-proof Jobs?
value.excerpt: Robots work well in perfectly controlled environments, such as factories and warehouses, and not in ad hoc environments like your aunt Sue’s attic. Forest rangers and electricians are a couple of jobs like this that come to mind, but there are many more.

value.title: Human Assisted Artificial Intelligence: A Pathway to Trustworthy And Unbiased AI
value.excerpt: Using AI for automating manufacturing and improving our work streams, such as providing robust CMMS (computerized maintenance management systems) is an excellent application for AI.

value.title: Cansel Brings TinySurveyor Robot to Canada
value.excerpt: CNW/ - Cansel, a software, hardware, and service provider to engineering, surveying, construction, and utility industries, announced today an exclusive agreement with Denmark -based TinyMobileRobots to distribute the TinySurveyor robot in Canada.

value.title: AiM Medical Robotics Appoints Dr. Babak Kateb to Medical Advisory Board
value.excerpt: AiM Medical Robotics, a leading developer of MRI-safe intraoperative robotics for neurosurgery, today announced that it is appointing Dr. Babak Kateb, founding Chairman of the Board of Directors & CEO of SBMT,

value.title: Here Is A Fully Autonomous AI-Powered Beehive That Could Save Bee Colonies
value.excerpt: More than 30 percent of the world's honeybee colonies are vanishing each year. This company created the first fully autonomous beehive that can rescue and protect the bee colony 24/7.

value.title: Leveraging Simulators and Robotics to Enhance Operations in the Education Sector
value.excerpt: Technological advancements are enhancing various industries like travel healthcare, education, and communication. The use of simulation and robotic technologies are proving to be excellent factors of existing educational resources.

value.title: Cassie the bipedal robot uses machine learning to complete a 5km jog
value.excerpt: Four years is a long time in robotics, especially so for a bipedal robot developed at Oregon State University (OSU) named Cassie. Dreamt up as an agile machine to carry packages from delivery vans to doorsteps,

value.title: AI-Powered Beach Cleanup Robots
value.excerpt: It’s estimated that more than 4.5-trillion cigarette butts are littered across the environment around the world, which is something the

value.title: Ambi Robotics releases Ambikit, a new kitting robot system
value.excerpt: Ambi Robotics introduces AmbiKit, a new AI-driven kitting applications that leverages vision and robots to pick items from bulk into kits.

value.title: INTERVIEW: Robotics and AI inspire new orchestral piece
value.excerpt: It’s not everyday that a new orchestral piece comes around that has been inspired by robotics, artificial intelligence and the relationship between humans and inanimates, but that’s exactly what listeners can expect when taking in the sounds of Lim Fantasy of Companionship for Piano & Orchestra.

value.title: Covariant raises $80M to ‘universal AI’ for robotic manipulation
value.excerpt: Covariant raised $80 million for its "universal AI" for robotic manipulation. The company has now raised $147 million in just two years.

value.title: Enterprise AI development platform DataRobot raises $270M, acquires Algorithmia
value.excerpt: DataRobot, an AI management and deployment platform aimed at the enterprise, has raised $270 million at a $6.3 billion post-money valuation.

value.title: Farm Tech Startup Iron Ox Hires David Silver, The Company's First Director of Robotics, as Company Prepares for Hypergrowth
value.excerpt: Iron Ox, a farming innovation company with deep expertise in robotics and artificial intelligence, hired its first Director of Robotics this week as the company accelerates growth and expands its commercial footprint.

value.title: Robotic AI firm Covariant raises another $80 million
value.excerpt: Covariant announced that it had raised a $40 million Series B. It was a health sum of money for the young company, bringing its total funding up to $67 million. Just a little over a year later, the Berkeley-based AI startup is adding another $80 million to its coffers,

value.title: BREAKING: Augmentus raises seed funding for its ‘no-code’ robotics system
value.excerpt: Augmentus is deploying its robotics platform across multiple industries - including indoor ag, where it streamlines crop inspection and harvesting.

value.title: Analytics Insight Announces 'Top Robotics Companies at the Forefront of Innovation' in 2021
value.excerpt: Analytics Insight has announced 'Top Robotics Companies at the Forefront of Innovation in 2021' in its July magazine issue. The issue recognizes ten trailblazing robotics companies leveraging disruptive technologies to transform different industries from healthcare and manufacturing to defence and education.

value.title: How Will Robots Impact Warehouse Design?
value.excerpt: JLL, a leader in real estate services, recently put out a research paper called “The future of global logistics real estate.” New warehouse designs need to incorporate features that take advantage of robots.

value.title: Google’s parent Alphabet to launch a new robotics and AI firm- Intrinsic
value.excerpt: Intrinsic is a business of the future as it deals with advances in robotics and Artificial Intelligence. Alphabet’s Intrinsic is an attempt by Google to expand into future technology as it already is developing some advanced tech using complex machinery,

value.title: China Roundup: Kai-Fu Lee’s first Europe bet, WeRide buys a truck startup
value.excerpt: Hello and welcome back to TechCrunch’s China Roundup, a digest of recent events shaping the Chinese tech landscape and what they mean to people in the rest of the world. Despite the geopolitical headwinds for foreign tech firms to enter China,

value.title: AI Weekly: OpenAI’s pivot from robotics acknowledges the power of simulation
value.excerpt: OpenAI has shuttered its robotics research team. But that doesn't mean the firm won't create a system capable of controlling a machine.

value.title: Alphabet to launch robotics firm Intrinsic under its other bets unit

value.title: Alphabet tackles industrial robot software market
value.excerpt: Google 's parent company Alphabet has launched a new company called Intrinsic to make industrial robots easier to program. Originally a project within Google's X research group, Intrinsic has graduated as an independent company within Alphabet.

value.title: Robots take the wheel: Lyft to offer driverless rides in Austin next year
value.excerpt: Austin will be one of the first markets to offer autonomous ride-hailing options through a partnership between Lyft, Ford and Argo AI.
